snippet: Illegal excavations are taking place at important archaeological sites all over Syria that are "extremely dangerous" and "lethal" to the country's cultural heritage, the U.N. cultural agency said Wednesday....

headline.print_headline: UN Says Illegal Excavations in Syria Are 'Lethal'
headline.main: UN Says Illegal Excavations in Syria Are 'Lethal'

lead_paragraph: Illegal excavations are taking place at important archaeological sites all over Syria that are "extremely dangerous" and "lethal" to the country's cultural heritage, the U.N. cultural agency said Wednesday.
